xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="nY~wr/bG}gm)3H%td6xM" x="100" y="14">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="o-%VSmhzm^bpMyW#FmkY">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id=",C5MH8nt4bH~lq`:r`SH">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="!p:Wr^_Uv;t,=/uKCl^b">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="Rm}z51Kf17WzN?I,/cpW">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="IvJYCHmC%-gE[6tSHH7E">
                    <field name="TEXT">Shawn</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="q08*-mcrqI@le*C`-IqF">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="V2k|HGA{ZR6F)-WXwD[H">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="p_VwG+NM5KvwL8:%{tm:">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="XIG}oz[K}}r3=AU`/L[E"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="K{BK7aH8lHLeaYC9J^^D">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="IQ5[0Jy3`oryyp=7vW^H">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="@K?VeL6`v1E58{N129=s">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="t%-9Pj1La!/X`mX|v-[|"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="Ozi8JV_0w_W,.9@I?^u1">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="+orym9NPwR{}[`j})5d3">
                            <field name="NUM">2</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="bit_button_event" id="f*%@(VK@;k6hB^w-.z%`" x="437" y="1192">
    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
    <statement name="do_">
      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id=")h;]RXu_/Z[=6tnO!f}H">
        <field name="music_">m4</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
